verses.verse: The YY <WH3068> reigneth <WH4427> <WH8804>; let the people <WH5971> tremble <WH7264> <WH8799>: he sitteth <WH3427> <WH8802> between the cherubims <WH3742>; let the earth <WH776> be moved <WH5120> <WH8799>.
The YY <WH3068> is great <WH1419> in TZiyon <WH6726>; and he is high <WH7311> <WH8804> above all the people <WH5971>.
Let them praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thy great <WH1419> and terrible <WH3372> <WH8737> name <WH8034>; for it is holy <WH6918>.

The king's <WH4428> strength <WH5797> also loveth <WH157> <WH8804> judgment <WH4941>; thou dost establish <WH3559> <WH8790> equity <WH4339>, thou executest <WH6213> <WH8804> judgment <WH4941> and righteousness <WH6666> in Ya`akov <WH3290>.
Exalt <WH7311> <WH8786> ye the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, and worship <WH7812> <WH8690> at his footstool <WH7272> <WH1916>; for he is holy <WH6918>.

Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> among his Kohanim <WH3548>, and SH'mu'el <WH8050> among them that call <WH7121> <WH8802> upon his name <WH8034>; they called <WH7121> <WH8802> upon the YY <WH3068>, and he answered <WH6030> <WH8799> them.
He spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto them in the cloudy <WH6051> pillar <WH5982>: they kept <WH8104> <WH8804> his testimonies <WH5713>, and the ordinance <WH2706> that he gave <WH5414> <WH8804> them.

Thou answeredst <WH6030> <WH8804> them, O YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>: thou wast a 'Elohim <WH410> that forgavest <WH5375> <WH8802> them, though thou tookest vengeance <WH5358> <WH8802> of their inventions <WH5949>.
Exalt <WH7311> <WH8786> the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, and worship <WH7812> <WH8690> at his holy <WH6944> hill <WH2022>; for the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> is holy <WH6918>.
